page.title: 11CHURCHES: GATESHEAD
page.content: {St.Augustines}is twenty/seven years old and a simple building with no stained glass windows, but with all the modern appliances of today. The church has a caring{attitude}towards the community, especially the sick and elderly, and wants to encourage the younger generation. There is a {Wesleyan Methodist {Chapel}in Springwell dating from 1880. A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A PRIEST. During the day the {priest }visits the sick and housebound, this takes until lunchtime. After lunch he does desk work, preparing sermons and at night he gives mass in the church. On a Friday afternoon there is a{choir } practice which consists mostly of girls and guitars are used as a back up. He works 24 hours a day as he must always be nearby to help others.
